segments.advisor_message: So, just to confirm, your life assurance policy is essential for ensuring your family’s financial security, right? You mentioned the monthly cost is around fifty dollars, and the amount assured is about fifty thousand. Did I get that right?
segments.client_message: Yeah, that's correct! The monthly premium is like fifty bucks, and if anything happens, they pay out fifty thousand. It's supposed to cover my family, especially if something unexpected happens.

segments.advisor_message: Got it. And you said the policy provider is ABC Insurance, correct? Also, is the policy written in trust?
segments.client_message: Yep, it's with ABC Insurance. And yeah, I wanted to make sure it's written in trust, just to make sure the payouts go directly to my family without any hassles.

segments.advisor_message: That makes sense. Lastly, you mentioned that this cover is supposed to last until retirement, right? Is there anything else I should note about this policy?
segments.client_message: Right, it’s good until my retirement. Oh, and just that I want to make sure it covers critical illness too, just in case!
